thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Refresco Says CMA Accepts Co's Remedy Proposal To Sell Off Aseptic Pet Facility

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Refresco Says CMA Accepts Co's Remedy Proposal To Sell Off Aseptic Pet Facility
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - REFRESCO GROUP NV:
* REG-CMA ACCEPTS REFRESCO‘S REMEDY PROPOSAL; COMPLETION OF THE ACQUISITION OF COTT‘S BOTTLING ACTIVITIES ANTICIPATED ON 30 JANUARY 2018
* REGARDING COMPETITION CONCERNS: ‍OFFERS AS REMEDY TO SELL OFF ASEPTIC PET FACILITY AT NELSON SITE​
* ‍ASEPTIC PET FACILITY WILL BE SOLD TO A SUITABLE BUYER​ * ‍UNTIL ALL REQUIREMENTS ARE MET, REFRESCO AND COTT WILL CONTINUE TO OPERATE SEPARATELY IN UK​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
